other_tests.findings: MIXED BACTERIAL FLORA ( >= 3 COLONY TYPES), CONSISTENT WITH SKIN AND/OR GENITAL CONTAMINATION.

Liver appears somewhat echogenic suggesting fatty infiltration. No focal hepatic mass lesions are seen. No evidence of intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilatation. The gallbladder appears grossly unremarkable. The spleen measures 5.8 cm and appears grossly unremarkable.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Direct comparison is made to prior exam; findings suggest possible progression to cirrhosis or fibrosis due to fatty infiltration.
